articles.title: RBL Bank gross advances up 3% at Rs 61,929 crore in FY22
articles.description: Retail advances declined 8 per cent year-on-year but grew 1 per cent sequentially. Wholesale advances surged 19 per cent year-on-year and 6 per cent on a quarter-on-quarter basis for the three months ended March 31.
articles.content:
Private sector lender RBL Bank on Wednesday said its gross advances grew by 3 per cent to Rs 61,929 crore in the last fiscal. The bank had recorded gross advances worth Rs 59,983 crore in FY21.
